scenario.name: UAS re-INVITE
scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] [last_Record-route:] Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

INVITE sip:[$5] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK1489807744192936848 From[$4] To[$3] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: SIPp/WinXP Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK sip:[$5] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/TCP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=z9hG4bK1489807744192936848 From[$4] To[$3] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70

BYE sip:[$5] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From[$4] To[$3] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: SIPp/WinXP Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: 0
